name: Abraxxes
desc: Abraxxes is the God of Conquest and is worshiped by barbarians and clerics, and is the Patron God of Dragonkin.

name: Actaeon the Stag
desc: Actaeon the Stag is the Spirit of Swiftness and is worshiped by druids and shaman.

name: Banden
desc: Banden is the God of the Wild and is worshiped by druids.

name: Beldmos
desc: Beldmos is the God of Creation and is worshiped by artificiers, and is the patron God of Mountain Dwarves.

name: Eldare
desc: Eldare is the Goddess of Song and is worshiped by bards, and is the patron Goddess of High Elves.

name: Gaeos
desc: Gaeos is the Primal Spirit of the Elements and is worshiped by shaman.

boon.name: By the Elements Combined
boon.desc: As a bonus action, you may channel the power of Gaeos, granting you resistance to cold, fire and lightning damage until your next turn. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Helenis
desc: Helenis is the Goddess of Death and is worshiped by rogues and warlocks, and is the Patron Goddess of Dark Elves.

name: Hotan
desc: Hotan is the God of Chaos and is worshiped by clerics and warlocks.

name: Iloru
desc: Iloru is the God of Enlightenment and is worshiped by monks.

name: Kolodian
desc: Kolodian is the God of the Hunt and is worshiped by rangers, and is the patron God of Wood Elves.

name: Kralkatorrik
desc: Kralkatorrik is the God of Storms and is worshiped by barbarians and shaman.

boon.name: By The Power Of Kralkatorrik
boon.desc: As a bonus action, you may channel the power of Kralkatorrik, granting you 1d4 lightning damage on your next attack. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Kuro the Owl
desc: Kuro the Owl is the Spirit of Wisdom and is worshiped by druids and shaman.

name: Lajozi
desc: Lajozi is the Spirit of Luck and is worshiped by bards and rogues.

boon.name: A Deal with Luck
boon.desc: As a bonus action, you may channel the power of Lajozi, granting you advantage on your next roll, then disadvantage on the roll after that. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Lenagos
desc: Lenagos is the God of Order and is worshiped by clerics and paladins.

name: Lothien the Fox
desc: Lothien the Fox is the Spirit of Cunning and is worshiped by druids and shaman.

name: Misha the Bear
desc: Misha the Bear is the Spirit of Strength and is worshiped by druids and shaman.

boon.name: Mother’s Embrace
boon.desc: As a bonus action, you may channel the power of Misha, granting you advantage on your next check to grapple. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Morgandra
alignment: Morgandra is the Goddess of Virtue and is worshiped by paladins, and is the Patron Goddess of Humans.
desc: Lawful Good

name: Ovara
desc: Ovara is the Goddess of Healing and is worshiped by clerics.

name: Rhokaugh
desc: Rhokaugh is the God of Courage and is worshiped by fighters.

name: Stratuul
desc: Stratuul is the God of Strength and is worshiped by barbarians, and is the Patron God of Orcs.

name: Ulshelak
desc: Ulshelak is the God of Madness and is worshiped by warlocks.

name: Veia
desc: Veia is the Goddess of the Arcane and is worshiped by sorcerers and wizards.

name: Yith
desc: Yith is the God of Secrets and is worshiped by rogues.

boon.name: Serpent’s Tongue
boon.desc: As a bonus action, you may channel the power of Yith, granting you advantage on your next Deception check. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.
